name: Gong
natural_language_description: 这是 Gong 节点。主要用于: Interact with Gong API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: call

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Retrieve data for a specific user
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve a list of users

call.name: call
call.natural_language_description: 参数名: Call to Get | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: properties (值: None) - The Call properties to include in the returned results. Choose from a list, or specify IDs using an expression.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: createdFromDateTime (值: None) - An optional user creation time lower limit, if supplied the API will return only the users created at or after this time
createdToDateTime (值: None) - An optional user creation time upper limit, if supplied the API will return only the users created before this time
userIds (值: None) - Set of Gong's unique numeric identifiers for the users (up to 20 digits)

user.name: user
user.natural_language_description: 参数名: User to Get | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
